verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w must|strong="H2351"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w female|strong="H5347"\w* alike; \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w where|strong="H7931"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*, \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*. \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* woman \w acts|strong="H6213"\w* \w unfaithfully|strong="H4604"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w committing|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* another, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* guilty

\w and|strong="H7725"\w* must \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H6213"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* must \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w full|strong="H7218"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7725"\w*, \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* value, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H6213"\w* wronged.

\w But|strong="H7725"\w* if \w the|strong="H5921"\w* man \w has|strong="H3068"\w* no \w relative|strong="H1350"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* whom \w restitution|strong="H7725"\w* \w can|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrong, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7725"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* must \w be|strong="H3068"\w* given \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ram \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w*, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w contribution|strong="H8641"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w by|strong="H3808"\w* sleeping \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* man, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w concealed|strong="H5641"\w* \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* husband \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* impurity \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w undetected|strong="H5641"\w* (since there \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w caught|strong="H8610"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H8610"\w* act),

\w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w if|strong="H7068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* feeling \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w comes|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* husband \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* suspects \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wife \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H7307"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w herself|strong="H1931"\w*—\w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H7068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* feeling \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w comes|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* suspects \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w though|strong="H1931"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H7307"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w herself|strong="H1931"\w*—

\w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grain|strong="H7058"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reminder|strong="H2146"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* woman \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w under|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w curse|strong="H7621"\w*—‘\w then|strong="H5307"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* attested \w curse|strong="H7621"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w making|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* shrivel \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* belly \w swell|strong="H6639"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w these|strong="H3789"\w* curses \w on|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scroll|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w wash|strong="H4229"\w* \w them|strong="H3789"\w* \w off|strong="H4229"\w* \w into|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* woman \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* brings \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w it|strong="H4325"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* enter her \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* cause her \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* suffering.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w take|strong="H7061"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w handful|strong="H7061"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w grain|strong="H6999"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w as|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* memorial \w portion|strong="H6999"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H4325"\w* \w on|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; \w after|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w have|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* woman \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.
